title: You might soon be able to summon Assistant on your Nest Hub Max by just looking at it
content:
The easiest and most convenient way to trigger Google Assistant on your phone and smart speaker is the “Hey Google” hotword. But it looks like Google is working on an even better way to activate Assistant. Our friends over at 9to5Google have discovered a string of code in the latest Google app beta that hints

The post You might soon be able to summon Assistant on your Nest Hub Max by just looking at it appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The upcoming "Look and Talk" feature will supposedly let you summon Assistant on your Google Nest Hub Max just by looking at it.
